001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.bitcore;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
005
006/**
007 * Result of OmniCore/BitCore {@code getaddressbalance} method.
008 */
009public class AddressBalanceInfo {
010    private final long balance;
011    private final long received;
012    private final long immature;
013
014    public AddressBalanceInfo(@JsonProperty("balance") long balance,
015                              @JsonProperty("received") long received,
016                              @JsonProperty("immature") long immature) {
017        this.balance = balance;
018        this.received = received;
019        this.immature = immature;
020    }
021
022    /**
023     * @return the current balance in satoshis
024     */
025    public Coin getBalance() {
026        return Coin.ofSat(balance);
027    }
028
029    /**
030     * @return the total number of satoshis received (including change)
031     */
032    public Coin getReceived() {
033        return Coin.ofSat(received);
034    }
035
036    /**
037     * @return the total number of non-spendable mining satoshis received
038     */
039    public Coin getImmature() {
040        return Coin.ofSat(immature);
041    }
042}
